articles.title: Senate passes Trump's big tax breaks and spending cuts bill
articles.description: The U.S. Senate has passed President Donald Trump's major tax and spending cuts bill after a turbulent session. The bill, which includes significant tax reductions and spending cuts to programs like Medicaid and food stamps, passed on a narrow 50-50 vote, with Vice President JD Vance casting the tie-breaking vote. [5, 8] The package will now return to the House for further consideration.

articles.title: Dalai Lama affirms succession plans, countering China
articles.description: The Dalai Lama has announced that the institution of the Dalai Lama will continue after his death and that his successor will be identified by his trust. [9, 10, 12] This move is a direct counter to China's insistence that it has the right to choose his successor. [9, 16] China's foreign ministry stated that the reincarnation must be approved by the central government. [9]

articles.title: Hamas responds to Gaza ceasefire proposal, seeks end to war
articles.description: Hamas has submitted its response to a U.S.-backed ceasefire proposal for Gaza, stating that it is seeking a permanent end to the war. [3, 11] The proposal reportedly includes a 60-day ceasefire and the release of Israeli captives in exchange for Palestinian prisoners. [7] While Hamas says it responded positively, it also noted that the current proposal does not guarantee an end to the conflict. [3]
